channel.title: tech — interfluidity
channel.description: Feed for blog 'tech — interfluidity', generated by unstatic

item.description: I hope to use this site as a kind of notebook of tech stuff I think about or encounter. I do a fair amount of online writing, but it's mostly finance, economics, politics, policy. But I also do a lot of coding. Stuff comes up that I think is worth noting, but that would not really interest my blog readership. So, now I have here. by Steve Randy Waldman on 2023-05-20 @ 04:05 AM...
item.title: A notebook
item.dc:creator: Steve Randy Waldman
item.content:encoded:
I hope to use this site as a kind of notebook of tech stuff I think about or encounter. I do a fair amount of online writing, but it's mostly finance, economics, politics, policy.

But I also do a lot of coding. Stuff comes up that I think is worth noting, but that would not really interest my blog readership.

So, now I have here.

by Steve Randy Waldman on 2023-05-20 @ 04:05 AM EDT
